tseny_pomogayut_pokupatelyam_ponyat_mogu: Prices help buyers understand whether they can afford to buy a product or if it is too expensive for them. The price determines whether they will buy the product from you or another seller. You must be able to focus on the client — in our case, on pet shops.
v_etoi_glave_ty_nauchishsya_formirovat_t: In this chapter, you will learn how to set a price for your product so that it is attractive to the buyer and profitable for you as a seller.
eto_samaya_vysokaya_tsena_postav_takuyu_: This is the highest price. Set the same price for your kitten.
samaya_vysokaya_tsena_po_kotoroi_magazin: This is the highest price at which shops buy kittens. Click the cat and set the same price for your kitten because at
teper_nazhmi_knopku_sokhranit_chtoby_mag: Now press the «SAVE» button so that the shops can see your new price.
zoomagazin_khochet_kupit_tvoego_kotika_p: A pet shop wants to buy your cat at the price we set.
vnimatelno_izuchayte_vitrine_zoomagazino: Study the shop showcases carefully to sell your kittens at the most profitable prices. This hint will help you complete the practical task.
vremya_na_vypolnenie_prakticheskogo_zada: The time to complete the practical task is limited. If your prices are attractive, pet shops will send you offers. Your task is to set the necessary prices before the offers arrive.
verno_ustanovi_tseny_na_prodazhu_svoikh_: Set the selling prices for your kittens correctly, and you will see whether the pet shops buy them. The time to complete the task is limited.
